name: Swing toolkit X access table of database

screenshots.caption: J2SE Java Beans appearance on a test program

short_description:
“Swing toolkit to access a table of a database“

This project provides data binding mechanism between some components on the screen (JFormattedTextField, JComboBox, JRadioButton, JcheckBox and JtextArea), and the fields of a table of a database. 

Purpose of the project: 
Much elaboration,  is needed to automatize manual work that users make with  databases; i.e. see on the screen data stored in the tables and also manipulate these data. The purpose of this project is to do easy the implementations of this kind of elaboration. 
This project  supply J2SE Java Beans that works in visual way, to realize software for applications connect  to databases to show their data on the screen and also to manipulate them.
In this way these J2SE  Java Beans do, with databases,  a work like to that JButton, JComboBox and the other Swing components do when we realize graphics user interfaces.
